name: Cambridge Memorial Hospital - Ontario Breast Screening Program
comment:
Breast screening for early detection of breast cancer in women

Screening includes digital mammography (x-rays of breast tissue) * screening results are sent to both the woman and her doctor

Women who receive normal results are automatically recalled for their next screening appointment * women who receive abnormal results are referred to their doctor for further investigation, or are referred directly for additional tests

Breast screening for early detection of breast cancer in women

Screening includes digital mammography (x-rays of breast tissue) * screening results are sent to both the woman and her doctor
